name: Flow like a Butterfly, Sting like a Bee!
name_original: Flow like a Butterfly, Sting like a Bee!
description:
Instructions:

WASD : Movement.
Left Click / Space: Switch Forms
Right Click: Shoot Stinger as Bee
Esc: Open Pause Menu

Try to survive as long as possible and destroy the foes. Can you beat all 10 Waves?

We highly recommend downloading the Windows Version, as the Html5 Version tends to be a bit laggy.

Music used:

"Metalmania" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
